text: وَأَخَذَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

translation.en: And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes [corpses] fallen prone
translation.id: Kemudian suara yang mengguntur menimpa orang-orang zalim itu, sehingga mereka mati bergelimpangan di rumahnya
